Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that expanding sales to grocery stores will benefit everyone.
Exist alternative explanation: Opponents argue that big grocery chains would only offer well-known craft brands, potentially harming smaller craft breweries and wineries.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Colorado currently has restrictions on the sale of full-strength beer and wine in grocery and convenience stores, indicating that it may not be universally beneficial.
